track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
Welcome to the 14th edition of HourRank! It's a one-hour rated contest with 3/4 algorithmic challenges. Are you fast and accurate enough to win it? 

The challenges for this round is prepared by Yury Bandarchuk and tested by Dan Sagunov.
primary_contest.name: HourRank 14

model.preview: Help George figure out Lily's homework
model.name: Lily's Homework
